Hi all,

I have heritrix 1.14.4 source code set up in eclipse. I have done =
some modifications in code and when I run the code from eclipse, I can see =
my modifications. 

But now I want to exit from eclipse and run heritrix in=
 command line with my new changes. But in my eclipse directory bin folder, =
I do not have heritrix and therefore I could not run the following command.=

% $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix --admin=3DLOGIN:PASSWORD

How do I proceed w=
ith my new source code changes..??

Regards
